Package dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.request

Class Request<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.sqlob.request.Request<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - handled type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateRequest, DeleteRequest, InsertRequest, SelectRequest

    public abstract class Request<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    A single transaction of a specific class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      protected Request​(java.lang.Class<T> type)
      Constructs a new request with name retrieved from type using PersistenceHelper.
      protected Request​(java.lang.Class<T> type, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a new request with an ID column and additional columns generated from each persistable field in type.
      protected Request​(java.lang.Class<T> type, java.lang.String name, java.lang.Iterable<Column<?>> columns)
      Constructs a new request with custom columns.
